original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 772: Raspberry Pi From the Man Himself
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett and Elliot Williams talk with Eben Upton About the Raspberry Pi! The conversation covers the new Pi 5, the upcoming CM5, the possible Pi500, and the Initial Public Offering (IPO) that may happen before too long. Theres also the PCIe port, the RP1, and the unexpected effects of using Broadcom chips. And then we ask the Billion Dollar question: Whats the money from an IPO going to fund? New hardware, software upgrades, better documentation? Nope, and the answer surprised us, too.


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Next week, were talking with Julian Lam about NodeBB!

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: Raspberry Piに関するインタビュー：新製品やIPOの話題
body: 記事では、Jonathan BennettとElliot WilliamsがRaspberry PiについてEben Uptonと話している。新しいPi 5や今後のCM5、可能性のあるPi500、IPO、PCIeポート、RP1などについて語られており、IPOによる資金は意外な方向に使われる予定だという話もある。
titles: Raspberry Piに関するインタビュー：新製品やIPOの話題

Broadcomチップの影響とRP1：Raspberry Piの最新情報
